definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of English origin, derived from the name Margaret, meaning 'pearl'. It has been used since the Middle Ages and carries connotations of traditional elegance and grace.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的女性名，由 Margaret 演变而来，意为‘珍珠’。自中世纪以来一直被使用，带有传统优雅与温婉的内涵。
definitions.example_en: Marjorie was a beloved teacher who inspired generations of students.
definitions.example_cn: 玛乔丽是一位深受爱戴的教师，激励了数代学生。
